name: Planities Vastus
description: From “In Umbra Luna” ongoing series   __   Since the dawn of night, man has been looking up to the sky to gaze at the selene star. Subject of all fantaisies, the moon has been observed, studied, approached and conquered. But its hidden face stays unknown   __   By de-structuring digital and physical textures, “In Umbra Luna” is developed as a speculative series. A collection revealing the imaginary geological and mineralogical features of a little-known lunar surface   __
